Start the sync server (blocking)

Source: R/server.R
serve.Rd

Starts the WebSocket server and enters the event loop. This function blocks until the server is stopped via stop_server().

Usage

serve(server)

Arguments

server

An amsync_server object.

Value

Invisibly returns the server object.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
server <- amsync_server()
serve(server)  # Blocks until stopped
} # }
